name: Voice of the Deep Pixel
description: Voice of the Deep is a metroidvania game with 10 levels. Your mission is destroy all monsters of the deep. The main tasks are find all the keycards (yellow, blue, green) and activate the doors in each level. You can repair your ship and refill your oxigen-level at sea-base stations.  Change your weapons with ALT-key and press ENTER for using your diver!
